channel.title: Help with fixing player count system
channel.description: Hello members of the moparscape community! How do i fix the player count system? I notice a lot of servers have that problem. Is there already a fix for this or do i have to make it my self. Thirteen people could be logged in and it would say twenty people were logged in. I stopped the nulls from being displayed. As that was such an easy fix. I was just trying 2 find the lazy way out. Tell me if i need to be more specific. Thanks.

item.title: Help with fixing player count system
item.dc:creator: @frugoo_scape frugoo scape
item.description:
@frugoo_scape wrote:

It is at twenty because it prevents lag. I have four servers running 24/7 so everyone can get on.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with fixing player count system

item.title: Help with fixing player count system
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

frugoo scape:

Nulls have nothing to do with it. They are not shown. The count is off an i jsut wanted to know if someone fixed this before. I do know this is a problem. I think for other people. I could be wrong though as so far it seams that i am.

Yeah, having it where only 20 people can log on is kind of a hasle. Just set it higher to around 30-35.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with fixing player count system

frugoo scape:

Gangster scape (pimp scape)

Hmm, i’ve never used it. Im guessing that whoever made it wrecked the player count so you will probebly have to fix it yourself.

item.title: Help with fixing player count system
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

Just because you disabled the nulls doesn’t mean they arn’t still there. They won’t show up on your players list but they are still there.

Read full topic
